attributes.action: ensure that all Ministers leave office as soon as they can in order that the government of the country is disrupted as little as possible.  This to apply, in especial, to Prime Ministers.  Who seem to be touring the World at our expense and are damage the environment in so doing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
